name: Bird Arms
description: The Skyfire Clan is a proud and noble race, and are expert weaponmakers.

name: Green Guard
description: Residing in the Rapid Chi Orchard, these stoic beings are superb at defense.

name: The Cat's Meow
description: If you plan on fighting in the shadows, this is the place to start.

name: Trawled Treasures
description: This guild became expert crafters after studying shipwrecked valuables.
